screen_desc: The screenshot displays the settings menu of a mobile phone. It includes options for managing connected devices (Bluetooth), apps & notifications, battery status (100%), display settings (wallpaper, sleep, font size), sound settings (volume, vibration, Do Not Disturb), and storage information (48% used, 32.62 GB free). The menu allows users to adjust various system preferences and monitor device resources.
history_actions: click on the Settings icon located at the upper left.
action_plan: Scroll down to find 'System' or 'Languages & input' settings.
If found, click on the relevant option to access keyboard settings.
Navigate to appearance settings within the keyboard options.
Modify the keyboard look as needed.

action_with_memory.Next Single Step Action: Scroll down to find 'System' or 'Languages & input' settings.
